content: Shawn, that is a powerful story. Thank you for sending me the link. May I suggest that you share it here on Medium? You are an excellent, and very readable writer. Your description of those years is a beautiful thing. I commend you for having pushed back at the drug habit — I know only too well how destructive it can be. I have one too many friends whose lives have been torn apart by drug use. I am glad for you that you were able to take solace in writing, and glad for you that you turned your life around. Please do keep writing about your life.
